page.title: 09A WINNING TRADITION
page.content: During recent years South Moor has followed the tradition of success first established in 1899 by Miles Handy when he became World Champion "Handball"or"Durham Fives"player. In April 1985 South Moor Modernaires Jazz Band came 2nd in the U.K.Finals and qualified for the World Championships.Other pursuits such as scrambling,flying model planes and snooker have also won awards.More traditional pursuits like bowls,golf, pigeon racing and cricket are also successful.Many of the young people attend Brownies,Guides,Boy's Brigade and Youth Clubs while the women of the village carry on the fine traditions of the W.I.and Mothers'Union. The success of these varied activities reflects the enthusiasm and competitive spirit of the local residents.
